trans-unit.source: Paints an area with a <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush.Visual*>.
trans-unit.target: 使用一种<xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush.Visual*>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush.Visual*>绘制区域

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to specify the <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush.Visual%2A> content of a VisualBrush.
trans-unit.target: 有两种方法来指定<xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush.Visual%2A>内容的 VisualBrush。</xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush.Visual%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Create a new <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual> and use it to set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush.Visual%2A> property of the VisualBrush.
trans-unit.target: -创建一个新<xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>并使用它来设置<xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush.Visual%2A>VisualBrush 属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush.Visual%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>

trans-unit.source: - Use an existing <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>, which creates a duplicate image of the target <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>.
trans-unit.target: -使用现有<xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>，这将创建目标<xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>重复图像</xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>

trans-unit.source: You can then use the VisualBrush to create interesting effects, such as reflection and magnification.
trans-unit.target: 然后可以使用 VisualBrush 创建有趣效果，如反射和放大倍数。

trans-unit.source: When you define a new <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush.Visual%2A> for a VisualBrush and that <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual> is a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> (such as a panel or control), the layout system runs on the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> and its child elements when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush.AutoLayoutContent%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 在定义新<xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush.Visual%2A>VisualBrush 并且<xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>是<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>布局系统上 （如面板或控件） 的运行<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>及其子元素时<xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush.AutoLayoutContent%2A>属性设置为`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush.AutoLayoutContent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual> </xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush.Visual%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, the root <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> is essentially isolated from the rest of the system; styles, storyboards, and external layout can't permeate this boundary.
trans-unit.target: 但是，根<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>实质上是独立于系统; 的其余部分样式、 情节提要和外部布局无法充满此边界。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you should explicitly specify the size of the root <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>, because its only parent is the VisualBrush and therefore it cannot automatically size itself to the area being painted.
trans-unit.target: 因此，应显式指定的根目录的大小<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>，因为其唯一的父级是 VisualBrush 并且因此它无法自动调整自身大小到正在绘制的区域。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: For more information about layout in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], see the [Layout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息中的布局[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]，请参阅[布局](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Updates to the visual tree of a VisualBrush will not propagate if a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect> is in the brush's parent chain.
trans-unit.target: 如果将不会传播到 VisualBrush 的可视化树的更新<xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect>画笔的父链中。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect>

trans-unit.source: You can workaround this limitation by forcing an update of the scene on the object above the effect.
trans-unit.target: 在上面的影响的对象上强制场景的更新的此限制可以解决方法。

trans-unit.source: You can call <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.InvalidateVisual%2A> or include an animation to force a scene update.
trans-unit.target: 你可以调用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.InvalidateVisual%2A>或包含一个动画，若要强制场景更新。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.InvalidateVisual%2A>

trans-unit.source: **Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> class, the VisualBrush class provides several special features: VisualBrush objects can be declared as and shared among multiple objects.
trans-unit.target: **可冻结功能︰**从继承，因此<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>类，VisualBrush 类提供了一些特殊功能︰ VisualBrush 对象可声明为，并且在多个对象之间共享。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the different features provided by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关提供的不同功能的详细信息<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象，请参阅[可冻结对象概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A VisualBrush cannot be made read-only (frozen) when its <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush.Visual%2A> property is set to any value other than `null.`
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> VisualBrush 不能设置为只读 （冻结），当其<xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush.Visual%2A>属性设置为任何值`null.`</xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush.Visual%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush"></xref> class that contains the specified <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush.Visual*>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush"></xref>类，其中包含指定<xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush.Visual*>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush.Visual*>

trans-unit.source: The contents of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 新的内容<xref href="System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush"></xref> will run layout its <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush.Visual*>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指定是否这<xref href="System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush"></xref>将其<xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush.Visual*>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush.Visual*>运行布局

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to `true` has an effect only when this brush's <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush.Visual%2A> is a non-parented <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置为`true`才起作用仅当此画笔的<xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush.Visual%2A>一非父级<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush.Visual%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this Brush should run layout on its <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush.Visual*>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此画笔应运行布局其<xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush.Visual*>; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush.Visual*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush.AutoLayoutContent*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush.AutoLayoutContent*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush.AutoLayoutContent*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush"> </xref>，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定 （但可能不再解析），但不是动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush"></xref>对象，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、 数据绑定和动画，而其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。
